member.summary: Does not rotate the code.

member.summary: Rotates the code 180° at the anchor position.

member.name: F:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.CodeDirection.TopToBottom

member.summary: Specifies the type of the bar code.

member.summary: The standard 2 of 5 interleaved bar code.

member.summary: The standard 3 of 9 bar code.

member.summary: The OMR code.

member.name: F:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.CodeType.DataMatrix
member.summary: The data matrix code.

member.name: T:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.DataMatrixEncoding
member.summary: The encoding used for data in the data matrix code.

member.name: F:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.DataMatrixEncoding.Ascii
member.summary: ASCII text mode.

member.name: F:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.DataMatrixEncoding.C40
member.summary: C40 text mode, potentially more compact for short strings.

member.name: F:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.DataMatrixEncoding.Text
member.summary: Text mode.

member.name: F:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.DataMatrixEncoding.X12
member.summary: X12 text mode, potentially more compact for short strings.

member.name: F:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.DataMatrixEncoding.EDIFACT
member.summary: EDIFACT mode uses six bits per character, with four characters packed into three bytes.

member.name: F:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.DataMatrixEncoding.Base256
member.summary: Base 256 mode data starts with a length indicator, followed by a number of data bytes. A length of 1 to 249 is encoded as a single byte, and longer lengths are stored as two bytes.

member.name: T:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.TextLocation
member.summary: Specifies whether and how the text is displayed at the code.

member.name: F:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.TextLocation.None
member.summary: No text is drawn.

member.name: F:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.TextLocation.Above
member.summary: The text is located above the code.

member.name: F:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.TextLocation.Below
member.summary: The text is located below the code.

member.name: F:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.TextLocation.AboveEmbedded
member.summary: The text is located above within the code.

member.name: F:PdfSharp.Drawing.BarCodes.TextLocation.BelowEmbedded
member.summary: The text is located below within the code.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers
member.summary: Extension method GetSubArray required for the built-in range operator (e.g.'[1..9]'). Fun fact: This class must be compiled into each assembly. If it is only visible through InternalsVisibleTo code will not compile with .NET Framework 4.6.2 and .NET Standard 2.0.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetSubArray``1(``0[],System.Range)
member.summary: Slices the specified array using the specified range.
